body_html:
Finally,I find a way to access jupyter notebook.Recreate a container and specify a password.

docker create -it -p 8888:8888 -e PASSWORD=JovialGates --name jovial_gates gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow
docker start jovial_gates

then I can enter the notebook.
body_text:
Finally,I find a way to access jupyter notebook.Recreate a container and specify a password.
docker create -it -p 8888:8888 -e PASSWORD=JovialGates --name jovial_gates gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow
docker start jovial_gates

then I can enter the notebook.
body:
Finally,I find a way to access jupyter notebook.Recreate a container and specify a password.
```
docker create -it -p 8888:8888 -e PASSWORD=JovialGates --name jovial_gates gcr.io/tensorflow/tensorflow
docker start jovial_gates
```
then I can enter the notebook.
